senses.sense_definition: A template or screen inserted in front of a light source to control the shape of the emitted light or project a pattern.

examples.text: The lighting designer inserted a metal <w>gobo</w> into the spotlight to project the image of leaves onto the stage floor.
We need a custom <w>gobo</w> with the company logo for the corporate event.

senses.sense_definition: A movable acoustic screen or panel used in a recording studio to shield a microphone from unwanted noise or separate sound sources.

examples.text: The engineer placed a <w>gobo</w> between the drummer and the bass player to prevent sound leakage.
Using a <w>gobo</w> helps isolate the vocals during a live recording session.

senses.sense_definition: The taproot of the burdock plant, used as a root vegetable in Japanese and other cuisines.

examples.text: The chef prepared a traditional dish using sliced <w>gobo</w> and carrots saut√©ed in soy sauce.
You can find fresh <w>gobo</w> in the produce section of most Asian supermarkets.
